import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Configurar Software Nómina"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/ubl2.1/config/softwarepayroll"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



CONFIGURAR SOFTWARE NÓMINA

- Requiere un token de autorizacion.
- El campo idpayroll, corresponde al id de software que entrega la DIAN.
- El campo pinpayroll, corresponde al pin del software propio de nómina.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"idpayroll":{"type":"string","example":"880eafd9-f445-4e0b-a355-92063e1557a4"},"pinpayroll":{"type":"integer","example":12345}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Software de nómina configurado con éxito","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
